item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: I saw this vid, and it looks kinda shafty, as it really only goes in 2 directions, but has a 2 foot or so slide in the other 2 directions. At one point you see him turn and go in one direction but stop and turn quickly because it hit the end. Although a neat idea - it just needs some tweaking.. Omni-directional Fork Lift though.. Now thats cool. http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-5406145976346920456&q=omni-directional+fork+lift&total=2&start=0&num=10&so=0&type=search&plindex=0
item.content:encoded: I saw this vid, and it looks kinda shafty, as it really only goes in 2 directions, but has a 2 foot or so slide in the other 2 directions. At one point you see him turn and go in one direction but stop and turn quickly because it hit the end. Although a neat idea – it just needs some tweaking.. Omni-directional Fork Lift though.. Now thats cool. http://video.google.com/videop.....;plindex=0
